name: ESG Platform
description: A platform to help companies manage and report their Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) data effectively using AI to analyze the gaps in their reporting.

name: A2K
description: An advanced machine learning system for intelligent keyword extraction from academic papers, combined with interactive data visualization.

name: Automatic Planting
description: Embedded IoT system for sensor data acquisition and data transfer to a web dashboard, alongside a LINE Messaging API webhook for automated event-based messaging.

name: Farming Game
description: A Java-based desktop pixel game that combines farming and cooking gameplay, allowing players to grow crops, gather ingredients, and create dishes in a retro-style environment.

name: TataDo
description: A web-based project management system designed to efficiently track progress, visualize timelines, and organize tasks for better workflow management.
